item.title: CTF校队2021暑期练习1
item.description: CTF题目 June. 21st 2021 Web: POST Practice This website requires authentication, via POST. However, it seems as if someone has defaced our site. Maybe there is still some way to authenticate? http://165.227.106.113/post.php 在Fiddler下POST没成功……真奇怪。 试了下发现网站下有robots.txt，里面记录了flag的位置。 Crypto: Base 2 2 the 6 There are so many different ways of encoding and decoding information nowadays… One of them will work! Q1RGe0ZsYWdneVdhZ2d5UmFnZ3l9 Base64加密，在CyberChef里面解密即可
